subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Lakers have agreed to terms with guard Sun Yue, who is playing for China’s Olympic team. Terms were not disclosed. Sun was the Lakers’ second-round draft pick last year.
snippet: The Los Angeles Lakers have agreed to terms with guard Sun Yue, who is playing for China’s Olympic team. Terms were not disclosed. Sun was the Lakers’ second-round draft pick last year.
